code: var getTimeLeft=function getTimeLeft(endTime){return endTime-Date.now();};export var getCountdownAsString=function getCountdownAsString(timeLeft){var days=Math.floor(timeLeft/86400000);var hours=Math.floor((timeLeft-days*86400000)/3600000);var minutes=Math.floor((timeLeft-hours*3600000-days*86400000)/60000);var seconds=Math.floor((timeLeft-minutes*60000-hours*3600000-days*86400000)/1000);return"".concat(days,"D : ").concat(hours,"H : ").concat(minutes,"M : ").concat(seconds,"S");};export var getCountdown=function getCountdown(endTime){var timeLeft=getTimeLeft(endTime);return getCountdownAsString(timeLeft);};
